00027         nodeType<T> * left;
00028         nodeType<T> * right;

00230 SimpleBinaryTree<T>::~SimpleBinaryTree()
00231 {
00232         destroy(root);
00233 }

00245 template <class T>
00246 SimpleBinaryTree<T>::SimpleBinaryTree()
00247 {
00248         root = 0;
00249 }

00254 
00262 template <class T>
00263 SimpleBinaryTree<T>::SimpleBinaryTree(const SimpleBinaryTree<T> & otherTree)
00264 {
00265         if (otherTree.root == 0)
00266                 root = 0;
00267         else
00268                 copyTree(root, otherTree.root);
00269 }

00287 template <class T>
00288 const SimpleBinaryTree<T> & SimpleBinaryTree<T>::operator=(const SimpleBinaryTree<T> & otherTree)
00289 {
00290         // Avoid self-assignment
00291         if (this != &otherTree)
00292         {
00293                 if (root != 0)
00294                         destroy(root);
00295 
00296                 if (otherTree.root == 0)
00297                         root = 0;
00298                 else
00299                         copyTree(root, otherTree.root);
00300         }
00301         return *this; // The value of the object that was just assigned.
00302 }

00390 template <class T>
00391 int SimpleBinaryTree<T>::height(nodeType<T> * p) const
00392 {
00393         if (p == 0)
00394                 return 0;
00395         else
00396                 return 1 + max(height(p->left), height(p->right));
00397 }

00415 template <class T>
00416 int SimpleBinaryTree<T>::max(const int & x, const int & y) const
00417 {
00418         if (x >= y)
00419         {
00420                 return x;
00421         }
00422         else
00423         {
00424                 return y;
00425         }
00426 }

00438 template <class T>
00439 int SimpleBinaryTree<T>::nodeCount(nodeType<T> * p) const
00440 {
00441         if (p != 0)
00442         {
00443                 return(
00444                                           1
00445                                         + nodeCount(p->left)
00446                                         + nodeCount(p->right)
00447                            );
00448         }
00449         return 0;
00450 }
00451 
00452 
00453 
00454 
00463 template <class T>
00464 int SimpleBinaryTree<T>::leavesCount(nodeType<T> *p) const
00465 {
00466         if (p == 0)
00467         {
00468                 // This is a leaf node
00469                 return 1;
00470         }
00471 
00472         // This is NOT a leaf node.
00473         return( leavesCount(p->left) + leavesCount(p->right) );
00474 }

00489 template <class T>
00490 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::copyTree(
00491                                                                 nodeType<T> * & copiedTreeRoot,
00492                                                                 nodeType<T> * otherTreeRoot
00493                                                         )
00494 {
00495         if (otherTreeRoot == 0)
00496                 copiedTreeRoot = 0;
00497         else
00498         {
00499                 copiedTreeRoot = new nodeType<T>;
00500                 copiedTreeRoot->data = otherTreeRoot->data;
00501                 copyTree(copiedTreeRoot->left, otherTreeRoot->left);
00502                 copyTree(copiedTreeRoot->right, otherTreeRoot->right);
00503         }
00504 }

00521 template <class T>
00522 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::destroy(nodeType<T> * & p)
00523 {
00524         if (p != 0)
00525         {
00526                 destroy(p->left);
00527                 destroy(p->right);
00528                 delete p;
00529                 p = 0;
00530         }
00531 }

00595 template <class T>
00596 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::inOrder(nodeType<T> * p) const
00597 {
00598         if (p != 0)
00599         {
00600                 inOrder(p->left);
00601                 cout << p->data << " ";  // process me in the middle.
00602                 inOrder(p->right);
00603         }
00604 }
00605 
00606 
00607 
00614 template <class T>
00615 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::preOrder(nodeType<T> * p) const
00616 {
00617         if (p != NULL)
00618         {
00619                 cout << p->data << " ";  // process me first
00620                 preOrder(p->left);
00621                 preOrder(p->right);
00622         }
00623 }
00624 
00625 
00626 
00627 
00634 template <class T>
00635 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::postOrder(nodeType<T> * p) const
00636 {
00637         if (p != NULL)
00638         {
00639                 postOrder(p->left);
00640                 postOrder(p->right);
00641                 cout << p->data << " "; // process me last
00642         }
00643 }
